ked in the area (2 ft from me in the corner) where the voice came from. LOL=

I am curious if anyone with a mi=
crophone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP in real time.
=A0
I=
=A0took part in=A0an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on =
Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in the three halls of the b=
uilding. The video for all=A0was being monitored and recorded=A0at a centra=
l location. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera sites conected =
to the central location. I wonder what we might have heard if we did?
=A0
Z=
ack
